Slow connection - sorry wins!
All Provinces are gone.

cards in supply: Cartographer, Embassy, Highway, Jack of All Trades, King's Court, Loan, Royal Seal, Steward, Village, and Walled Village

----------------------

#1 Slow connection - sorry: 31 points (4 Provinces, 4 Estates, and a Duchy); 19 turns
                         opening: Jack of All Trades / Steward
                         [33 cards] 2 Jacks of All Trades, 1 Highway, 1 King's Court, 1 Royal Seal, 1 Steward, 1 Walled Village, 7 Coppers, 8 Silvers, 2 Golds, 4 Estates, 1 Duchy, 4 Provinces

#2 richard: 30 points (5 Provinces); 19 turns
         opening: Loan / Jack of All Trades
         [24 cards] 3 King's Courts, 3 Stewards, 2 Cartographers, 1 Jack of All Trades, 1 Walled Village, 1 Copper, 5 Silvers, 3 Golds, 5 Provinces

#2 Kazantzakis: 30 points (3 Provinces, 3 Duchies, and 3 Estates); 19 turns
             opening: Copper / Highway
             [29 cards] 7 Highways, 1 King's Court, 1 Village, 8 Coppers, 1 Silver, 2 Golds, 3 Estates, 3 Duchies, 3 Provinces

----------------------

trash: 6 Coppers, a Loan, and 3 Estates


Game log

Turn order is richard, Slow connection - sorry, and then Kazantzakis.

The 13 chosen cards are Alchemist, Cartographer, Embassy, Highway, Ill-Gotten Gains, Jack of All Trades, King's Court, Loan, Royal Seal, Steward, Upgrade, Village, and Walled Village.
richard vetoes Ill-Gotten Gains.
Slow connection - sorry vetoes Upgrade.
Kazantzakis vetoes Alchemist.


(richard's first hand: 3 Coppers and 2 Estates.)
(Slow connection - sorry's first hand: 4 Coppers and an Estate.)
(Kazantzakis's first hand: 2 Coppers and 3 Estates.)


— richard's turn 1 —
richard plays 3 Coppers.
richard buys a Loan.
(richard draws: 4 Coppers and an Estate.)

   Slow connection - sorry buys a Jack of All Trades.
